title: How to Draw the Star of David

steps.title: Draw an upside down triangle.
steps.content: Draw an upside down triangle. It should be relatively close to the bottom of your paper.

steps.title: Draw another triangle.
steps.content: Draw another triangle. It should be intersecting the first one, and should be right side up.

steps.title: Draw a border.
steps.content: Draw a border. You can do this by drawing parallel lines next to all of the original lines. Make sure they're parallel.

steps.title: Erase the inner lines.
steps.content: Erase the inner lines. You can either make it complicated, or just simply erase all the inner lines. But make sure you erase your lines neatly.

steps.title: Color it in.
steps.content: Color it in. Since Israel's national colors are blue and white, these are recommended.

steps.title: Draw a triangle normal, pointing up.
steps.content: Draw a triangle normal, pointing up.

steps.title: Draw another Triangle, this one pointing down.
steps.content: Draw another Triangle, this one pointing down. The two should overlap so it forms a six-pointed star.

steps.title: Erase the lines inside the star.
steps.content: Erase the lines inside the star.
